meanings.definition: The behavior or characteristics of a wigger.
meanings.sent1: His wiggeries included trying to imitate hip-hop culture.
meanings.sent2: The store sold clothing that reflected wiggeries.
meanings.sent3: At the party, his wiggeries made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her wiggeries were like a costume at a play.
meanings.sent5: The wiggeries of the group were hard to miss.

meanings.definition: The style or fashion associated with wiggers.
meanings.sent1: She embraced the wiggeries of baggy pants and oversized shirts.
meanings.sent2: The magazine featured the latest wiggeries in streetwear.
meanings.sent3: His wiggeries stood out in a sea of traditional outfits.
meanings.sent4: The wiggeries of the 90s are making a comeback.
meanings.sent5: The wiggeries of the celebrities set new trends.
